title: ISic003449. prayer of two brothers
body:
Facsimile Images

Εὐχή Πανχα [ρίου]
καὶ Ἰωάννο [υ]
ἀδελποί ( vac. 2)

Apparatus criticus

Text after Rizzone 2009

English translation

Prayer of Pancharios and Ioannos, brothers
